name: @fantech/skills
description: Shared agent skills and CLI for Fantech engineering practices

scripts.format: oxfmt src commit/scripts release/scripts changeset/scripts bin package.json tsconfig.json
scripts.format:check: oxfmt --check src commit/scripts release/scripts changeset/scripts bin package.json tsconfig.json
scripts.precommit: npm run -s lint && npm run -s format:check && npm run -s typecheck
